title: [RESOLVED] Game Start / End Issues - 22/02/2016
body:
Hi All,

We're aware of issues that are currently occurring with starting and finishing games.  We're currently working on a solution to this issue and will update this thread as soon as possible.

**Updates:**

**22/02/2016 12:56 PM AEDT**: We've fixed the root cause of the issues - we're now seeing people being able to start and finish games successfully. See you on the Rift!

**22/02/2016 12:50 PM AEDT**: We've found the root cause of the issue and we're working to rectify the problem now.

replies.body:
Man, I booked a day off from my busy schedule at work to play with my cousin who is visiting this country.

Very disappointing, and wish that the 1 day IP boosts I purchased for us don't go to waste now. 

Goddamn.

EDIT: UPDATE - 9.55AM
Just connected to game.

Thanks riot!!!
Got Login in issues now rip
Great opportunity to sit in champ select and get to know your teammates....Good guy Rito

ZAAAAAP, refund my 1 day xp boost cheers mate, this is just bizarre, HOW BIZARRE

ZAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAP realllllll bizarre. reporting riot in game
That's some hyper speed bug squishing, much love.
Well time to make a sandwich.{{champion:222}}
how long will this take?
We're working to fix it at the moment  - we'll keep the main part of the thread updated when we have more information.
So i got my win and my LP thnx. But 7Lp are you serious....... i usually get 20
Did everyone connect in? I just finished mine, was a 16 min game and I was like on the inhib towers before someone else got back. Was a +11. The other guy didn't get a loss prevention I don't think.
Just won a game 2 minutes ago but stats weren't loading. Will it still be counted?
Ez riot

but i cannot even  instal the game! I have redownloaded so many times, it still can't instal the game. When i click the LOL, the image appeared and disappeared after 3mins, and nothing happened! No installation or launcher! What should i do?
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

love it how after winning my game i didnt get Lp but then eventually you gave me 7 LP................ i just lost and now im on 0 Lp gj riot i should be on at least 10 and ps i get matched with horrible people is it possible if i can get better team match ups? I deserve Silver but i cant climb Due to bad teams.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

>
> Hi All,

> We're aware of issues that are currently occurring with starting and finishing games.  We're currently working on a solution to this issue and will update this thread as soon as possible.

Was 3-5, now 3-6... so it counted as a loss in my placements, even though the game itself had "loss prevented" on it. 2v5 game, just great.
Yay +11 LP for winning my ranked lol. With me as the only person that connected.
lucky you haha
I am now having login PROBLEMS!!!!! Come one rito you are really dropping the ball here

Won the game, game ended normally, but didn't count as a win for my ranked stats and didn't get any LP, now can't join any other game as it says I'm assigned to an existing game. Relogged, now it says reconnect? GL with this one team Rito!
Same im pretty sure we wont get it...............

Update : now the reconnect button working . thanks , gj guys all Rito IT  :) 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
yay theres a loading screen xD
eta on when ranked queues will be back up?

>
> eta on when ranked queues will be back up?

Dude, the problem is only 10 mins old... give them a chance to work out whats wrong before asking for an ETA....
At least 40 mins old now
Actually I have been in Reconnect for over an hour now.
im winning 2.5 hours
Back in game its fixed, CHilling in loading screen 100%

> **22/02/2016 12:50 PM AEDT**: We've found the root cause of the issue and we're working to rectify the problem now.
so we DO get our purchases refunded and RP compo? thanks man appreciate it. ez
- optimus crime
I won a game today in ranked then i left my room and come back and i didnt get any Lp. Will i get my Lp at all? Riot?
It also isnt showing up in my match history
i want to know this too, same thing with me
My promos ;( riot plz don't let the abandon count
I had this happen once ages ago in an aram, but the game started for everyone else and i get a leaver buster warning.....

I won a ranked today but it isnt showing up in my match history and i havent earned any Lp, will i even get it?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

stuck in champ select....
Quick question - If we were about to load into a ranked game will it be counted as a lost or?
Chances are all ranked games in process will be given Loss Prevention
We can only hope
